column1: Smoque BBQ////OMG - can I say BBQ heaven???!!!  Now I'm no bbq expert
column2: but this is damn good food.  I make the 20 mile car ride once a month to treck out to this little hole in the wall bbq joint.  I've had the sliced brisket
column8: and cole slaw.  I love the sliced the brisket
column9: and their cornbread.  The cornbread is moist
column11: and their bbq sauce is very tasty.  Pulled pork is delicious
column12: but I prefer the brisket.  The Texas sausage is a very yummy
column13: smokey sausage.  Their cole slaw is vinegar based and no mayo.
